Level 60 Magic and Attack is required to wield it. As well as being able to cast Magic spells, it can be sufficiently used as a melee weapon due to its attack bonuses. Item ID6526

A toktz-mej-tal (also known as an obsidian staff) is a two-handed staff used by the TzHaar-Mej, and can be obtained as a very rare drop from them. Level 60 Magic and Attack is required to wield it. As well as being able to cast Magic spells, it can be sufficiently used as a melee weapon due to its attack bonuses. It is one of the only staves that requires two hands to equip, the others being the Crystal staff and Corrupted staff. However, only the Toktz-mej-tal is usable outside of The Gauntlet.

Ten of these are used to build an obsidian fence at level 83 Construction in a player's Superior Garden.

[[File:Toktz-mej-tal detail.png|150px|left]]
A '''toktz-mej-tal''' (also known as an '''obsidian staff''') is a two-handed [[staves|staff]] used by the [[TzHaar-Mej (Monster)|TzHaar-Mej]], and can be obtained as a very rare drop from them. Level 60 [[Magic]] and [[Attack]] is required to wield it. As well as being able to cast Magic [[spells]], it can be sufficiently used as a [[melee]] weapon due to its attack bonuses. It is one of the only staves that requires two hands to equip, the others being the [[Crystal staff (basic)|Crystal staff]] and [[Corrupted staff (basic)|Corrupted staff]]. However, only the Toktz-mej-tal is usable outside of [[The Gauntlet]].

Ten of these are used to build an [[obsidian fence]] at level 83 [[Construction]] in a player's [[Superior Garden]].
